text:
Broadway, north from Pine Street, showing a construction platform in front of Trinity Church Yard. Shown across same is the 8-story Boreel Building, No. 113-119 Broadway. Note the absence of the former 5-story Trinity Building (No. 111 Broadway) that stood at the northern edge of the Cemetery. This was replaced by a 20-story structure about 1905. On the same side and in the distance appears the turret roofed Home Life Insurance Co. Building.

May 28, 1904.

Brown Brothers.
